help.desc: Get informations about a command. You can enter app name after help command (php core/manager help app)

cache.desc:
Manage iumio cache  
        --clear : Clear cache environment (Dev environment as default)  
        --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, ALL) (must used with --clear)

assets.desc:
Manage project assets 
        --copy : Copy project assets to web directory  
        --symlink (must with --copy option) Symbolic link will be created 
        --clear : clear all web assets 
        --appname : App name 'Example --appname=DefaultApp' (must be use with --copy or --clear option)       
        --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, ALL)

app.desc:
Manage project 
        create : Create project  
        switch : Change the default project 
        remove : Remove a project
